title: Elementary Mathematics Practical Competency Enhancement Course Based on Organizational Learning Structures

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational mathematics pedagogy and organizational learning theories
context.additional_context: For current elementary math educators, understanding the impact of organizational structure types (organic/mechanistic) on learning effectiveness and developing mobile-friendly instructional strategies.

learning_goals: Learning environment design strategies applicable to mathematics education settings can be proposed by analyzing characteristics of organizational structure types (organic/mechanistic)
The effects of centralized decision-making and controlling socialization strategies on organizational learning can be assessed through case-based evaluations
Mathematics teaching method improvement plans reflecting organic structure characteristics (autonomy, low formalization) can be established and implemented
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
